title: A developer who enjoys creating arts

aboutme.aboutme3: ... who can code with these technologies.
aboutme.aboutme4: I am also an artist who loves drawing and design.
aboutme.aboutme5: With these two passions, I strive to create professional technological productions that satisfy users' eyes and experience.

contact.title: Contact
contact.contact1: Feel free to reach out to me with these addresses!

cungdesign.description: This is a multi-page website I designed and coded as a personal project. The website showcases artworks made by Cung Design.

lindsay.description: This is a published website I redesigned and coded for a children book author - Lindsay Currie to make the user experience more enjoyable.

four.description: This is a published website I redesigned for Tom Henderson including improving its usability and reorganzing its content for better performance.

squirrel.description: This 2D mobile game was coded and designed by a team of three for the purpose of improving student's awareness of a healthy nutrition for squirrels.

memory.description: I worked on this game as a research assistant during junior year at Knox college. I coded and redesigned to improve its UX/UI.

message.description: I coded and designed this simple app to send birthday and graduation congratulation messages to my friends during the COVID-19.

icicle.description: This 2D game was coded and designed by a team of two as a class project of Knox College.
